Episodes.Title: Orphan of War
Episodes.Plot: When Xena tries to help the centaurs protect a sacred stone that contains their evil, she encounters someone from her past...her son.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Taylor, Paul Gittins, Mark Ferguson, Alexander Campbell, Stephen Papps, Richard Adams, Peter Tait

Episodes.Title: Remember Nothing
Episodes.Plot: When Xena defends the Fates's temple, they give her the gift of changing the past: her brother Lyceus never died and she never became the warrior princess...but that also means she never met Gabrielle.
Episodes.Director: Anson Williams, Steven L. Sears, Chris Manheim
Episodes.GuestStars: Aaron Devitt, Robert Harte, Stephen Tozer, Rebecca Kpacka, Micaela Daniel, Elizabeth Pendergrast, Slade Leef, Mark Ferguson

Episodes.Title: The Giant Killer
Episodes.Plot: When Gabrielle defends a young Isrealite named David, her life is threatended until Xena proposes to fight her old friend, the giant Goliath in return for freedom for the Philistines.
Episodes.GuestStars: Todd Rippon, Anthony Starr, Calvin Tuteao, Dale Corlett, Emma Brunette, Brad Homan, John Leonard, Antony Starr

Episodes.Title: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun
Episodes.Plot: When Orpheus loses the power to subdue the god Bacchus with his music, Xena and Gabrielle risk their lives to end Bacchus's reign of terror.
Episodes.GuestStars: Matthew Chamberlain, Anthony Ray Parker

Episodes.Title: Return of Callisto
Episodes.Plot: Gabrielle plans to marry Perdicus, her hometown sweetheart, and must leave Xena and their travels, at the same time that Callisto has escaped from prison and is headed straight for them with vengeance in mind.
Episodes.GuestStars: Hudson Leick, Scott Garrison

Episodes.Title: Warrior... Princess... Tramp
Episodes.Plot: When Diana's father takes ill, Xena is summoned and runs into yet another lookalike, a barmaid named Meg, who seems quite taken with Joxer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lucy Lawless, Lucy Lawless, Chris Bailey, Norman Forsey, Simon Fa'amoe, Collette Pennington, Tai Hadfield, Tim Faville

Episodes.Title: Intimate Stranger
Episodes.Plot: Callisto makes a bargain with Ares, from Tarturus, to switch bodies with Xena, sending Xena into Tarturus and freeing Callisto. Xena, in Callisto's form, makes her own bargain with Hades, to make things right but the only problem is...she has one day to fix it.
Episodes.GuestStars: Hudson Leick, Erik Thomson, David Te Rare

Episodes.Title: Ten Little Warlords
Episodes.Plot: Trapped in the body of Callisto, Xena must help a mortal Ares recover his sword and restore him as the god of war. If she doesn't mortals will not be able to control their anger and she'll never recover her own body.
Episodes.GuestStars: Hudson Leick, Charles Siebert, Bruce Hopkins

Episodes.Title: A Solstice Carol
Episodes.Plot: During Winter Solstice, Xena and Gabrielle visit a town where it's Scrooge-like King has deemed that celebrating the holiday is a crime.
Episodes.GuestStars: Daniel James, Junior Chile, Peter Vere-Jones, Joe Berryman, Sheri Booth, Gennieve Lucre, Jaimee Kaire-Gataulu, Nicko Vella, Tony Bishop

Episodes.Title: The Xena Scrolls
Episodes.Plot: In the year 1940, two female archaeologists searching for the Xena scrolls end up in an ancient tomb confronting legendary figures from the past.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert G. Tapert, Mark Ferguson

Episodes.Title: Here She Comes... Miss Amphipolis
Episodes.Plot: Xena masquerades as a beauty pageant contestant, to stop a sabateur, bent on destroying a peace treaty between two warlords.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert Trebor, Calvin Tuteao, Karen Dior, Jennifer Becker, John Sumner, Brenda Kindall, Jennifer Rucker, Simone Kessell

Episodes.Title: Destiny
Episodes.Plot: After being gravely injured, Xena's life flashes before her, including the time when she learned the art of pressure points from a slavegirl and when she met Julius Caesar for the very first time.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ebonie Smith, Nathaniel Lees, Grant Triplow

Episodes.Title: The Quest
Episodes.Plot: After Xena's death, Gabrielle becomes Queen of the Amazons, while Autolycus finds himself possessed by the warrior princess, Xena who needs ambrosia to bring herself back to life. But Xena's rebirth and Gabrielle's life are both threatened by an Amazon bent on obtaining the Amazon crown and the ambrosia.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Hurst, Jodie Dorday, Melinda Clarke

Episodes.Title: A Necessary Evil
Episodes.Plot: Xena, Gabrielle and the Amazons must battle an evil Amazon, who ate ambrosia and is now a god. She wants Gabrielle dead and in order to stop her, Xena and Gabrielle resort to asking for the help of the now immortal Callisto.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jodie Dorday, Melinda Clarke

Episodes.Title: A Day in the Life
Episodes.Plot: Xena and Gabrielle spend a day trying to save two villages, one from a band of thugs, the other from a giant, while getting on each other's nerves and trying to not kill on another.
Episodes.GuestStars: Alisha Wall

Episodes.Title: For Him the Bell Tolls
Episodes.Plot: With Xena away on a mission, Gabrielle must contend with Aphrodite, who's interfering in one of Cupid's lovespells that will unite two kingdoms and who's put a spell on Joxer, who behaves like a real hero whenver a bell rings.
Episodes.GuestStars: Karl Urban, Mandie Gillette, Craig Parker, Rachale Davies, Ross Jolly

Episodes.Title: The Execution
Episodes.Plot: Xena and Gabrielle have only one day to determine what really happened when Gabrielle's friend, Meleagor, is sentenced to death for a murder he didn't commit.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tim Thomerson, Patrick Khutze

Episodes.Title: Blind Faith
Episodes.Plot: After getting oil in her eys during a fight, Xena goes blind and must deal with a man determined to kill her and rescue Gabrielle before she is forced to marry a king, who has died, or Gabrielle will soon join him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Graham Lauder

Episodes.Title: Ulysses
Episodes.Plot: Xena and Gabrielle must help Ulysses, King of Ithica, who is trying to return to his island homeland after ten years away, but the god of the sea, Poseidon, doesn't make it easy.
Episodes.GuestStars: Rachel Blakely, John D'Aquino, Timothy Raby, Charles Siebert, Carl Bland

Episodes.Title: The Price
Episodes.Plot: After becoming the hunted prey of the vicious Horde, Xena must lead the local army against them, while Gabrielle tends to the wounded and worries that Xena is returning to her dark and dangerous ways by stooping to the Horde's level.
Episodes.GuestStars: Beth Allen, Paul Glover, Charles Mesure, Tamati Rice, Mark Perry, Justin Curry, Jason Hoyte

Episodes.Title: The Lost Mariner
Episodes.Plot: After a shipwreck, Xena must rescue Gabrielle from the cursed ship of Cecrops, the lost mariner, where anyone who steps aboard is there until they die.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tony Todd

Episodes.Title: A Comedy of Eros
Episodes.Plot: When Cupid's infant son, Bliss, runs amok putting love spells on unsuspecting people, Xena falls in love with the warlord, Draco, Draco falls for Gabrielle and Gabrielle gets the hots for Joxer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Karl Urban, Jay Laga'aia, Anthony Ray Parker, Cameron Russell, Barry Te Hira, Catherine Boniface, Vanessa Mateja, Cherie Bray Taylor, Collette Pennington, Sean Grant
